alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 27 at 8:28PM CDT until May 05 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. .Water levels drop into Action Stage for a brief period, before returning to Minor Flood Stage Saturday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY, MAY 05... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Forest River at Minto. * WHEN...Until Thursday, May 05. * IMPACTS...At 7.5 feet, Old Highway 81 is underwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 5.5 feet and then begin rising early Saturday morning. It will then rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning to 7.0 feet early Monday afternoon. It will fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
